titleStmt.title: A letter to an honourable Member of Parliament concerning the great growth of popery, and the treasonable practices of the Romish bishops and priests, at this time, in England.
titleStmt.author: R. W.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed, and sold by the booksellers of London and Westminster,

notesStmt.note: Signed and dated: Your most affectionate, humble servant, R.W. London, Jan. 15. 99.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
